Method Detail

convert

public static <NodeType,NodeData extends INodeData<NodeType>,EdgeType,EdgeData extends IEdgeData<EdgeType>> Map<Object,DefaultGraphCell> convert(Graph graph,
                                                                                                                                                 DataFactory<NodeData,EdgeData> factory,
                                                                                                                                                 ImprovedJGraph<NodeType,NodeData,EdgeType,EdgeData> jgraph)
Converts a JGraphT graph into an ImprovedJGraph. You can specify the graph and a DataFactory which assigns node data and edge data to the nodes and edges of the graph.

Using this method is different than creating a new object of class ImprovedJGraphAdapter in that this method can put the information from the graph and data into objects of any subclass of ImprovedJGraph that you like, whereas converting via the constructors of this class just creates objects of a particular subclass (namely ImprovedJGraphAdapter.

Type Parameters:
NodeType - a node type class
NodeData - a class representing node data
EdgeType - an edge type class
EdgeData - a class representing edge data
Parameters:
graph - a JGraphT graph
factory - a factory providing data for each node and edge
jgraph - the ImprovedJGraph object that should be filled with the information in the graph
Returns:
a mapping of graph nodes to cells in the ImprovedJGraph.
